name: Sabich Complete
reason: Middle Eastern restaurant where labneh and yogurt are commonly used, and heirloom tomatoes can complement dishes. Extremely close (0.08km).

name: פסטה ויה | Pasta Via
reason: Italian restaurant that can use cream, butter, white wine, and rosemary in pasta and sauces. Very close (0.30km).

name: Amore Mio
reason: Italian restaurant where artichokes, rosemary, and white wine are ideal for Mediterranean dishes. Close (0.30km) and likely to appreciate fresh ingredients.
